md:
giải nghĩa từ "glitches" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Glitch (noun) /ɡlɪtʃ/:
	+ Meaning: A sudden, brief problem or error in a machine or system, especially a computer.
	+ Vietnamese: Lỗi kỹ thuật, sự cố kỹ thuật.
	+ Example: The game was interrupted by a glitch that caused the character to disappear.
	+ Related words: bug, error, malfunction, fault.

* Glitch (verb) /ɡlɪtʃ/:
	+ Meaning: To cause a sudden, brief problem or error in a machine or system, especially a computer.
	+ Vietnamese: Gây ra lỗi kỹ thuật, xảy ra sự cố kỹ thuật.
	+ Example: The new software glitched and crashed the entire system.
	+ Related words: malfunction, crash, freeze, bug.

Note: The verb form of "glitch" is less common than the noun form, but it is still used in some contexts.

  • Glitch (noun) /ɡlɪtʃ/:

    • Meaning: A sudden, brief problem or error in a machine or system, especially a computer.
    • Vietnamese: Lỗi kỹ thuật, sự cố kỹ thuật.
    • Example: The game was interrupted by a glitch that caused the character to disappear.
    • Related words: bug, error, malfunction, fault.

  • Glitch (verb) /ɡlɪtʃ/:

    • Meaning: To cause a sudden, brief problem or error in a machine or system, especially a computer.
    • Vietnamese: Gây ra lỗi kỹ thuật, xảy ra sự cố kỹ thuật.
    • Example: The new software glitched and crashed the entire system.
    • Related words: malfunction, crash, freeze, bug.

Note: The verb form of "glitch" is less common than the noun form, but it is still used in some contexts.
